text: We started the day with tamales and chile relleno made with my mother’s recipe, and now we‘re about to eat my sister’s delicious gumbo that she makes every year. Merry Christmas to all! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvT8C4VXQAATNWI.jpg

The news of another child death in CBP custody is heartbreaking, especially on Christmas. We must demand a full and thorough account of what happened to this 8-year-old boy. https://www.npr.org/2018/12/25/680066848/8-year-old-migrant-boy-dies-in-government-custody-in-new-mexico-hospital
Jane and I want to take this opportunity to wish everyone a very Merry Christmas and a happy holiday season.
RT @_MTAnderson I post this old Christmas photo because I just noticed my pocket square is my sister’s hamster. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvRwgPrX0AEbrEH.jpg
Wishing everyone a very Merry Christmas 🎄 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvQr-1-WoAAraLe.jpg
As we celebrate Christmas and the holiday season, let us rededicate ourselves to a world of peace - and economic, social, racial and environmental justice.

For a child is born to us, a son is given to us; upon his shoulder dominion rests. They name him Wonder-Counselor, God-Hero, Father-Forever, Prince of Peace.

Isaiah 9:5

Opening presents Christmas morning w/ Heidi, Caroline, Catherine & Schuyler the hamster. Hot chocolate, Christmas carols & the laughter of children. #HeavenOnEarth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvSLYCmU0AA9ykh.jpg
From our family to yours, wishing you a Merry Christmas filled with hope, happiness, and good cheer. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DvRk2TeWsAAWHdu.jpg
